divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from work in mid-august 2001 when i pulled into our subdivision at approximately 5:30pm. it was a relatively clear day and as i drove slowly down this road (20mph speed limit in our neighborhood) my attention was drawn to the horizon just over the tree-line at the end of the street, probably about 1\8 mile in front of me. i noticed what i thought was a small plane moving across the sky west-to-east (left-to-right). what immediately jumped out at me was how low the plane was flying along with the blue-red glow that at this distance seemed to envelope the object. my first thought was that it was a low-flying plane so i rolled down my window but there was no discernible engine noise. as i got a little closer i expected that whatever it was would become more obvious but the only thing that changed was that the blue-red color seemed to be emanating (sp) from the bottom of the object. i kept trying to make out wings or tail with no luck. at this point i was approaching the end of the street and the first of two quick right-turns. as i took the first right turn the object seemed to be picking up speed and disappeared on the other side of some trees. the second right turn about 6 houses down got me out from under the trees and while the object was still viewable, it had definitely sped up and was almost out of sight, still heading east-northeast and still hugging the top of the trees. after a couple of seconds it was gone. i pulled into my driveway about 15 seconds later and rushed inside to tell my wife what i had just seen. as i stood in our dining room trying to explain this, i heard what sounded like a helicopter flying extremely low over my home. i immediately went out the front door, looked up and there were two black helicopters flying unusually low over our subdivision, heading in the same direction as the object. the time between my sighting and the black helicopters passing over our home was maybe 2-3 minutes. i'd never seen anything like this before and wasn't sure who to call so i contacted the local police dept. i gave the dispatcher the description of the events of the last 10 minutes including the two black choppers that had passed overhead, almost as if they were tailing this object. she was polite but had not had any other calls and didn't have much to offer.
